message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $90?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $95. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
